price: 28. Dheh: Bal ka warrama haddii Alle na oofsado aniga iyo inta ila jirta (mu'miniinta), ama noo naxariisto, yaa ka badbaaadin gaalada cadaab xanuun badan?
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَهۡلَكَنِيَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِيَ أَوۡ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ مِنۡ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in ahlakaniya al-lahu waman maʿiya aw raḥimanā faman yujīru al-kāfirīna min ʿadhābin alīmin
